title: R. Kelly victim reveals her life behind mansion walls with R. Kelly as his lawyer fights back
itunes:title: R. Kelly victim reveals her life behind mansion walls with R. Kelly as his lawyer fights back
description:
Singer R Kelly's lawyer Steve Greenberg and one of the hip hop star's accuser, Lisa Van Allen, confront each other on the sex abuse allegations in this episode, part 2 of Nancy Grace's look at the controversy. Nancy's panel of experts also includes former prosecutor Nicole DeBorde, psycho analyst Dr Bethany Marshall, private investigator Vincent Hill, and RadarOnline reporter Alexis Tereszcuk. Grace also looks at the cold case investigation into the burning dead of Denver teen Maggie Long. Her experts include Cold Case Research Institute director Sheryl McCollum, Atlanta criminal lawyer Darryl Cohen, and Crime Stories reporter Robyn Walensky.

 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
